name: Death Statues Mod
description:
Look at Config Options Before Continuing!
When you die, or have the config option enabled for spawning it above when a statue base block is placed, a player-like statue entity of you is spawned that has the same skin, wears the same armor as you, and has items from both of your hands.
It can be spawned by either placing down a statue base block (Default: DISABLED), or by dying.
You can also place down a more block-like Death Statue Block on top of the base block, or have the base block place it above itself for you (Default: DISABLED).
Both blocks and the entity will allow you to right click on them to access the statue base block's storage.
You can Shift + Right-Click on the entity to change the armor and hand items like an armor stand.
You can Shift + R-Click + L-CTRL on the entity to get it in item form with the armor and hand items.
You can press [R] to spawn a ring of fake statue entities with your name instead of the normal statue name to allow you to make a quick escape...or play a goofy prank.
P.S. I also still haven't made a custom block entity renderer, so there are no armor, item, pose, or matching skin texture displays yet for the statue block.
